heading: HB00004
0: AN ACT CREATING CIRCUIT CRIMINAL COURTS GRANTING THEM EXCLUSIVE ORIGINAL JURISDICTION TO TRY AND DECIDE CERTAIN CRIMINAL CASES, AMENDING BATAS PAMBANSA BILANG 129, AS AMENDED, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE JUDICIARY REORGANIZATION ACT OF 1980, APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
principal-authors: FARIÑAS, RODOLFO C.; ALVAREZ, PANTALEON D.; ANDAYA, ROLANDO JR. G.; DUAVIT, JOHN MICHAEL R.; COJUANGCO, CARLOS O.; KHO, ELISA "OLGA" T.; ABU, RANEO "RANIE" E.; SALIMBANGON, BENHUR L.; NOGRALES, KARLO ALEXEI B.; SUAREZ, DANILO E.; BATOCABE, RODEL M.;
status: Pending with the Committee on JUSTICE since 2016-07-26
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00004
FULL TITLE : AN ACT CREATING CIRCUIT CRIMINAL COURTS GRANTING THEM EXCLUSIVE ORIGINAL JURISDICTION TO TRY AND DECIDE CERTAIN CRIMINAL CASES, AMENDING BATAS PAMBANSA BILANG 129, AS AMENDED, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE JUDICIARY REORGANIZATION ACT OF 1980, APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
SHORT TITLE : Circuit Criminal Courts Act Of 2016
ABSTRACT : Creates Circuit Criminal Courts in all judicial regions in the country, thereby granting them exclusive original jurisdiction to try and decide certain criminal cases.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : FARIÑAS, RODOLFO C., ALVAREZ, PANTALEON D., ANDAYA, ROLANDO JR. G., DUAVIT, JOHN MICHAEL R., COJUANGCO, CARLOS O., KHO, ELISA "OLGA" T., ABU, RANEO "RANIE" E., SALIMBANGON, BENHUR L., NOGRALES, KARLO ALEXEI B., SUAREZ, DANILO E., BATOCABE, RODEL M.
DATE FILED : 2016-06-30
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Reform
